author: Special Correspondent
text:
Mobile banking service at Tamil Nadu State Apex Cooperative Bank and new buildings for the Cooperative Department were schemes and buildings inaugurated by Chief Minister Jayalalithaa at a total cost of Rs. 88 crore on Saturday.

The mobile banking service the facility has been set up at a cost of Rs. 43 lakh.

The Chief Minister also inaugurated 168 godowns in 21 districts with a total capacity of 33,500 tonnes at a cost of Rs. 29.86 crore, a press release said.

She also inaugurated cooperative unions, godowns, modernised district central cooperative bank branches, Amma medical shops, Farm Fresh outlets, Amma Amudham supermarkets in different districts across the State. The Kumbakonam Central Cooperative Bank’s branch in Kadambadi constructed at a cost of Rs. 54 lakh was also inaugurated.
title: Godowns, services inaugurated
